main.name: David Ward
main.description: New grad proficent in using Python and C++ for data analysis and slightly proficcent in fullstack development using Microsoft's dotnet technologies
main.bio: I like automating whatever I can and learning new technologies. I have the most experience with data analysis in C++/Python followed by full stack web development with the DOTNET entity framework stack with Angular. Over the years I'd say my greatest skill is in troubleshooting. I think technology is at the core of what powers a lot of our modern world and that makes contributing it infinitely exciting.
